use_planck_spectrum.comment: If True, use a Planck function for the stellar sed, otherwise use Phoenix

use_planet_spectrum_file.comment: 1= uses an input spectrum from file, 0=uses an estimate based on the radius or flux ratio

interp_stellar_spectrum.comment: if 1 interpolates Phoenix spectra to the input values of the star, otherwise if 0 chooses the closest spectrum from the available grid

ecliptic_lat.comment: select an ecliptic latitude for the star (for zodi model)

fake_switch.comment: 1 overides planet input above (astroscene, planet) and uses the fake system inputs

use_norm.comment: 0 or 1: use a star spectrum normalized to given magnitude
